      • LAUNCHABLE_TRIGGER_RADIUS

        public double LAUNCHABLE_TRIGGER_RADIUS()
        Description copied from class: Droppable
        trigger radius [m] for Launchables to set up the Droppable's effect (explosions etc.). It is class specific.

        Note that this value only applies to approaching Launchables.

        Every descendant may have its own value.

        Specified by:
        LAUNCHABLE_TRIGGER_RADIUS in class Droppable

      • LIFE_TIME_AVG

        public double LIFE_TIME_AVG()
        Description copied from class: Droppable

        The actual life time will be subject of normal distribution.

        Every descendant may have its own value.

      • TRIGGER_RADIUS

        public double TRIGGER_RADIUS()
        Description copied from class: Droppable
        trigger radius [m] for Panzers to set up Droppable's effect (explosions etc.). It is class specific.

        Also determines the activation distance.
        (see Droppable#calculateMotion)

        Every descendant may have its own value.

        Specified by:
        TRIGGER_RADIUS in class Droppable
